thread.title: IHG extends travel management contract with CWT
thread.title_full: IHG extends travel management contract with CWT

title: IHG extends travel management contract with CWT
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Mon, 10 Aug 2015 12:51 Follow @thomasnewcombe Intercontinental Hotels Group (IHG) has extended its travel management contract with Carlson Wagonlit Travel (CWT).
CWT has held the contract for IHG’s global business travel since 2009 and will continue to do so until at least 2017.
CWT global programme solutions executive VP Cathy Voss, said: “Like CWT, IHG places great importance on connecting people, so we are delighted to have the opportunity to build on our existing relationship.
“We believe that through our outstanding customer service, online booking tools and increased use of mobile technology, we can drive further value for IHG moving forward.“
Last month , CWT launched a new reporting tool that is currently being tested by 30 of the TMC’s clients.
